mapper.select: SELECT f_request_id FROM request_freelancer WHERE pboard_id = #{pboard_id} AND f_request_isAgree = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (pboard_id, user_no, chat_content, f_request_id) VALUES (#{pboard_id}, #{user_no}, #{chat_content}, #{f_request_id})
mapper.select: SELECT cm.chat_room_id, cm.pboard_id, cm.user_no, cm.chat_content, ui.user_name FROM chat_message cm JOIN user_info ui ON cm.user_no = ui.user_no WHERE cm.pboard_id = #{pboard_id} ORDER BY cm.chat_date DESC
